elements.title: Moots Routt Escape is a $13,000 Titanium Adventure Dream Bike
elements.contents:
Moots Routt Escape is a $13,000 Titanium Adventure Dream Bike

Adding to the legendary Routt lineup is the all-new Routt ESC for 2022. The “Escape” model is a super capable drop-bar titanium adventure bike that can hold up to a 29x 2.4’’ tire and costs up to $13,353.

elements.title: Dude Builds Upcycled Basket Bike Elevator For His Treehouse
elements.contents:
Dude Builds Upcycled Basket Bike Elevator For His Treehouse

Ethan Schlussler is an upcycling genius as evidenced by this amazing basket bicycle treehouse elevator that he built to access his tree fort system in the northern woods of Idaho. In this video by Kirsten Dirkson we see Ethan describe all the parts and thinking behind the one-of-a-kind bike elevator.

Read More
Dave MalwitzJanuary 23, 2022video, treehouse, bike elevator 1 Comment
